Title: Holo no Graffiti
Description: ['From unraveling the secrets of opening and closing doors to defusing surprise packages more commonly known as bombs, there is never a dull day at the Hololive Production office! ', Holo no Graffiti, ' follows an eccentric cast of Virtual YouTubers, also known as "VTubers," going about their absurd yet hilarious daily lives, detailing all their cute moments and mishaps.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' [Written by MAL Rewrite]']
